title: [Bug]Maximum range smite stops all movement commands. + video
body:
It is very simple.
Maximum range smite will stop all movement commands. this includes the attack command(simply right clicking on a target)
Here's a short video to show how to replicate.
It's extremely frustrating when you need to gap close using the blue smite and this happens.
https://youtu.be/eMXLFPzVPo4

replies.body: When you Smite beyond its maximum range, or cast a ward beyond its maximum range, you are giving your champion a new movement command to path into range of the target unit/area and then cast the desired ability at that unit/area.

Explains a lot.
I would still say it should be changed
